languages.text: {n}Андровета-Фи охает и ахает, вознося руки к небу.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Омниссия{/g}, защити нас! Духа заразил хворью какой-то мирянин! Вот кого следует искать, а не всяких трубоведов! Кощунство!"

{n}Raising her hands high, Androveta-Phi wails,{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g} preserve us! The great spirit was infected by a layperson! That is the culprit you should be searching for, not some pipewarden! Sacrilege!"
languages.original_text: {n}Андровета-Фи охает и ахает, вознося руки к небу.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Омниссия{/g}, защити нас! Духа заразил хворью какой-то мирянин! Вот кого следует искать, а не всяких трубоведов! Кощунство!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Androveta-Phi wails, raising her hands high,{/n} "Omnissiah preserve us! The great spirit was infected by a layperson! That is the culprit you should be searching for, not some pipewarden! Sacrilege!"

{n}Raising her hands high, Androveta-Phi wails,{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g} preserve us! The great spirit was infected by a layperson! That is the culprit you should be searching for, not some pipewarden! Sacrilege!"

{n}Raising her hands high, Androveta-Phi wails,{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g} preserve us! The great spirit was infected by a layperson! That is the culprit you should be searching for, not some pipewarden! Sacrilege!"

languages.text: {n}Levant les mains au ciel, Androveta-Phi se met à hurler :{/n} « L'{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnimessie{/g} nous garde ! Sacrilège ! Le grand esprit a été infecté par une créature profane ! Le voilà, le coupable que vous devez traquer, au lieu de courir en vain après un quelconque égoutier ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Raising her hands high, Androveta-Phi wails,{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g} preserve us! The great spirit was infected by a layperson! That is the culprit you should be searching for, not some pipewarden! Sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Levant les mains au ciel, Androveta-Phi se met à hurler :{/n} « L'Omnimessie nous garde ! Sacrilège ! Le grand esprit a été infecté par une créature profane ! Le voilà, le coupable que vous devez traquer, au lieu de courir en vain après un quelconque égoutier ! »

{n}Levant les mains au ciel, Androveta-Phi se met à hurler :{/n} « L'Omnimessie nous garde ! Sacrilège ! Le grand esprit a été infecté par une créature profane ! Le voilà, le coupable que vous devez traquer, au lieu de courir en vain après un quelconque égoutier ! »

languages.text: {n}Androveta-Phi vuelve a alzar las manos y clama:{/n} «¡Que el {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g} nos preserve! ¡Un laico ha infectado al gran espíritu! ¡Ese es el criminal al que deberían estar buscando, no a un inspector de tuberías! ¡Sacrilegio!».
languages.original_text: {n}Raising her hands high, Androveta-Phi wails,{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g} preserve us! The great spirit was infected by a layperson! That is the culprit you should be searching for, not some pipewarden! Sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Androveta-Phi vuelve a alzar las manos y clama:{/n} «¡Que el Omnissiah nos preserve! ¡Un laico ha infectado al gran espíritu! ¡Ese es el criminal al que deberían estar buscando, no a un inspector de tuberías! ¡Sacrilegio!».

languages.text: {n}安多维塔-菲高高举起双手，哀号起来。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}保佑我们！伟大的机魂遭到了教外人士的玷污！你们要找的犯人根本不是什么管道员，应该是她才对！何等亵渎！”
languages.original_text: {n}Raising her hands high, Androveta-Phi wails,{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g} preserve us! The great spirit was infected by a layperson! That is the culprit you should be searching for, not some pipewarden! Sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}安多维塔-菲高高举起双手，哀号起来。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚保佑我们！伟大的机魂遭到了教外人士的玷污！你们要找的犯人根本不是什么管道员，应该是她才对！何等亵渎！”

languages.text: {n}アンドロヴェータ・ファイは手を高く挙げて、叫んだ。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}万機神{/g}よ、我らを守りたまえ！偉大な精神が素人に感染したのです！パイプ監視員ではなく、犯人を捜すべきだ！冒涜だ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Raising her hands high, Androveta-Phi wails,{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g} preserve us! The great spirit was infected by a layperson! That is the culprit you should be searching for, not some pipewarden! Sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アンドロヴェータ・ファイは手を高く挙げて、叫んだ。{/n}「万機神よ、我らを守りたまえ！偉大な精神が素人に感染したのです！パイプ監視員ではなく、犯人を捜すべきだ！冒涜だ！」

languages.text: {n}Androveta-Phi hebt die Hände hoch in die Luft und heult:{/n} "Der {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g} bewahre uns! Der große Geist wurde von einem Laien infiziert! Das ist der Täter, den Ihr suchen solltet, kein Rohrhüter! Sakrileg!"
languages.original_text: {n}Raising her hands high, Androveta-Phi wails,{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g} preserve us! The great spirit was infected by a layperson! That is the culprit you should be searching for, not some pipewarden! Sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Androveta-Phi hebt die Hände hoch in die Luft und heult:{/n} "Der Omnissiah bewahre uns! Der große Geist wurde von einem Laien infiziert! Das ist der Täter, den Ihr suchen solltet, kein Rohrhüter! Sakrileg!"

languages.text: {n}Ellerini havaya kaldıran Androveta-Fi, haykırmaya başlıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Hermesih{/g} esirge bizi! Kudretli ruh, avam tabakasının elleriyle lekelendi! Aramanız gereken suçlu budur, bir hat muhafızı değil! Kutsala hürmetsizlik edildi!"
languages.original_text: {n}Raising her hands high, Androveta-Phi wails,{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g} preserve us! The great spirit was infected by a layperson! That is the culprit you should be searching for, not some pipewarden! Sacrilege!"
